name: SkyFall - Arcade Survival
description:
Summary

SkyFall is an arcade game where the player tries to dodge rocks falling from the sky while surviving as long as they can. As the you survive, more and more rocks with unique mechanics are added and the rocks drop at an even higher frequency. Log in with your GameJolt account and try to get a highscore!

Levels

SkyFall includes 4 levels; the grass, cave, desert and ice levels. Each of these (Excluding the first) have unique challenges including static obstacles and an exclusive rock type.

Cosmetics

Surviving in a level and collecting coins will increase your score. You can use this score to purchase different customization options such as colors and hats for your cube!
